title: Why Trump Is Going After Iran Now
summary_full: As President Trump warns that “we have a lot of very big, very powerful ships sailing to Iran right now,” our national security correspondent David E. Sanger breaks down what to know.
summary_public: As President Trump warns that “we have a lot of very big, very powerful ships sailing to Iran right now,” our national security correspondent David E. Sanger breaks down what to know.

IR.evidence: very powerful ships sailing to Iran right now
